mapper.insert: insert into votes (promise_seq, place_id, member_seq, vote_cnt) values(#{promiseSeq}, #{placeId}, #{memberSeq}, 0)
mapper.select: select v.vote_seq, v.promise_seq, v.place_id, v.member_seq, vote_cnt, place_x, place_y from votes v join places p on v.place_id = p.place_id where v.promise_seq = #{promiseSeq} order by v.vote_seq
select exists (select 1 from voters_members vm where vm.member_seq = #{memberSeq} and vm.vote_seq = #{voteSeq})
mapper.delete: delete from voters_members where member_seq = #{memberSeq} and vote_seq = #{voteSeq}
